properties.address: The Reading Rooms,, HOLBEACH, SPALDING, Lincolnshire PE12 7LL
properties.description: Mainly the elderly although we also support people with mental health and other issues, also providing food for anyone struggling to feed themselves or their family Come in and enjoy a tea or coffee whilst enjoying the warmth from 10.30 a.m. every Friday, making new friends, with a two-course home-cooked meal served at 12:00
properties.title: Reading Rooms, Holbeach

properties.address: 69 Chapelgate, , Sutton St James, Lincolnshire PE12 0EF
properties.description: A warm welcome awaits you at Sutton St James Baptist Church, pop in for a chat and a cuppa, a biscuit or sometimes we have homemade cake! Tackle a board game or some colouring or just enjoy making new friends. Everyone welcome.
properties.title: Sutton St James Baptist Church

properties.address: 19 Church Road, Tilney All Saints, KING'S LYNN, Norfolk PE34 4SJ
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 29th November 2023** Tilney All Saints Village Hall is regarded as one of only two community assets that Tilney All Saints has, the other being the primary school. The building was refurbished in 2017 including: eco-friendly air source heating system; new ceiling with LED lighting, vinyl flooring and fire-resistant doors; a disabled toilet together with baby changing facility; upvc double-glazed windows and new tables and chairs. In 2019, the car park was refurbished and in 2022 the kitchen upgraded and the main and fire doors updated. The venue is a clean and warm up-to-date facility that is at the heart of the village. We will be providing hot and cold refreshments including, most people's favourite, bacon butties and all for free!!! Earlier this year (January to March 2023) we used the venue as a Hot Spot / Warm Hub, which was very well attended and received, and we are able to provide the same facility again only over a longer period (November 2023 until March 2024).
properties.title: Tilney All Saints Village Hall

properties.description: A welcoming cafe style room serving hot and cold drinks, and offering puzzles, games, arts and crafts etc. A great space to meet up with others.
